blocks.name: Ice Walk
blocks.text: [name] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

blocks.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
blocks.text: If [name] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d10 + str] piercing damage plus dmg[1d8] cold damage.

blocks.name: Claw
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d6 + str] slashing damage.

blocks.name: Tail
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d8 + str] bludgeoning damage.

blocks.name: Frightful Presence
blocks.text: Each creature of [name]'s choice that is within 120 ft. of [name] and aware of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to [name]'s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

blocks.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
blocks.text: [name] exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking dmg[12d8] cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

blocks.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [name] beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of [name] must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take dmg[2d6 + str] bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. [name] can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
